code_SemperKI.handlers.files.uploadFiles(request)¶

Generic file upload for a process

Parameters:

request (HTTP POST) – Request with files in it

Returns:

Successful or not

Return type:

HTTP Response

code_SemperKI.handlers.files.downloadFile(request, processID, fileID)¶

Send file to user from storage

Parameters:

  • request (HTTP POST) – Request of user for a specific file of a process

  • processID (Str) – process ID

  • fileID (Str) – file ID

Returns:

Saved content

Return type:

FileResponse

code_SemperKI.handlers.files.downloadFilesAsZip(request, processID)¶

Send files to user as zip

Parameters:

  • request (HTTP POST) – Request of user for all selected files of a process

  • processID (Str) – process ID

Returns:

Saved content

Return type:

FileResponse

code_SemperKI.handlers.files.deleteFile(request, processID, fileID)¶

Delete a file from storage

  • processID (Str) – process ID

  • fileID (Str) – file ID
